DOC.brief_title: Patient Activation Intervention Improving Screening Rates Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To test patient activation intervention improve colorectal cancer ( CRC ) screen rate use fecal occult blood test ( FOBT ) among male female patient 50 year old East Central Columbus Neighborhood Health Center . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess change knowledge attitude CRC screen watch educational video . II . To assess effectiveness provide communication skill train improve discussion focus CRC screen patient-provider visit . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 arm prior medical visit . ARM I ( Education ) : Patients receive CRC CRC screen information educational video brochure healthy hint prevent CRC . ARM II ( Education patient activation ) : Patients receive CRC CRC screen information communication skill training ( patient activation ) intervention educational video brochure brochure healthy hint prevent CRC . After medical visit , patient ' medical record review 1 month 2 month visit document CRC screen completion .
